data.text: My husband and I went for a work related in Deira Dubai and we decided to stay in Fortune Pearl Hotel for 3 nights, since we check in we didn‚Äôt see anyone smile until check out. We booked for Queen bed with City view but when we checked in, the receptionist guy said there is no room available with city view and they said that they will check on next day and inform us but on the next day no one update us. There is club in 5 floor which is so much noise of music from 10 PM to 4 AM in the morning. We want to use swimming pool so we ask to the reception which floor of the swimming pool but no one informed us that swimming pool is closed after getting there one of the lifeguard said the pool is  closed. It was a worst stay we couldn‚Äôt have good rest, the facilities are not working and the staff are not follow up their job.
data.title: Worst stay

data.text: Excellent service, I have stayed for one month with my family, the stay was very comfortable and the was spacious, I had came here first time it‚Äôs very good hotel for family, the rooms are cleaned, the staff are very friendly and helpful, next time I will came back again, thank so much to the management and staff to make my stay comfortable.
data.title: Excellent service

data.text:
MR JITEN RUINS OUR STAY
On the first day of our stay 14/07/23 my girlfriend went down to collect food that we ordered and passed by the reception to ask for another key because she left the one we have in the room...arriving in the room she was saying something about a bellboy on the reception being rude to her saying*we don't give two keys to our guest if you forgot it ..its on you now*..but this did not get my attention...

The next day 15/07/23 i went myself down to take food from the delivery guy..we had a miscommunication me and the delivery guy where i was supose to pay by cash but i had only card and dollars on me..so i rush to the reception seeking for help mr *jiten* was there..i said *can you plz change my 20 dollar i need to pay this delivery guy*
There were no reaction on his face ..he was like *the rate is low ok?*i said *ok*...and then he paused for a sec and he said *no actually i cannot do it*...i was like *why i really need this money to pay this guy*...And he was like
 *i cannot do it because i don't want to*
He added by saying this is not his problem if i don't have cash..
I needed help so i ask if there was any atm nearby...he said *bro i don't know*
So i ended up cancelling my order turning by back to the reception and coming back to my room because there was no point of making a scene with such people..having hospitality backgrounds and working for a hotel right now am sure this is not a way of treating a guest.
data.title: Mr jiten ruins our stay

data.text: Hi! I‚Äôm from room 228 and 229.Ur hotel is very nice & everything was very beautiful.Specially the room survent was too nice.Mr.Hasan and Mr.Rashed they weere too kind and helpful.But I think you guys should improve ur pool side.Otherwise the hotel and everything was greatü´∂üèªMe and my family just loved it‚ù§Ô∏è
data.title: A great experience with fortune pearl hotel

data.text: Very accomodating staff. Clean room. Affordable price. We want to be back here next time and i will recommend this hotel to my other friends. The location is near Union metro and walking distance to other mall. Thank you so much
data.title: Good hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Joyleenmaye,
Greetings from Fortune Pearl Hotel!
Thank you for your overwhelming review and recommendations. Also, thank you for taking the time to post your feedback on Trip Advisor. We would like to express our gratitude to your positive review following your recent event with us. We are so glad to know that we were able to meet your expectations. I am delighted to know that the level of our services and facilities exceeded your expectations with memorable service provided by our team.
Your compliments will be shared with our team; as such flattering remarks continuously inspire us to do our utmost in everything that we do.
We certainly look forward to welcoming you back to Fortune Pearl Hotel again
Yours sincerely,
Anand Prakash.R
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Fortune Grand Hotel Management
